title: DIY Compost Bin | Fun Homestead Projects

subtasks: Collecting organic materials for compost (e.g., grass clippings, leaves, horse manure, watermelon rinds, cardboard).
Using a pitchfork to turn compost.
Organizing compost into different sections for various materials (e.g., cardboard and horse manure, pine shavings, weeds, fruit and vegetable scraps).
Ensuring proper moisture levels for compost development.
Addressing damage from horses (e.g., donkeys chewing on the original pen).
Redesigning or replacing the round pen.
Collaborating with family members during filming.
Highlighting the learning process and sharing tips with viewers.
Promoting homesteading practices such as composting and self-sufficiency.
